Description: Head of Zeus Ammon, right; dotted border. (obverse)
Eagle with closed wings standing left on thunderbolt; left field, tripod; right field, monogram. (reverse)
State: Associated with: Kingdom of Egypt Ancient Greece and Rome: Kingdom of Egypt
Bibliographic references: Svoronos 1904 / Τα Νομισματα του Κρατους των Πτολεμαιων (The Coins of the Ptolemaic Kings) (792)
BMC Greek (Palestine) / Catalogue of the Greek coins of Palestine (Galilee, Samaria and Judaea) (29, p.65)
Associated names: Named in inscription: Ptolemy II Philadelphos
